assessmentQuestionVersion.name: Tafamidis_Renew_Discontinuation_Criteria_Q1
assessmentQuestionVersion.questionText: Do any of the following discontinuation criteria apply? The patient has received either one of the following: a. Heart or liver transplant b. An Implanted Cardiac Mechanical Assist Device (CMAD) c. Concurrent disease-modifying treatment indicated for ATTR-CM?
